metadata.description: From the pages of Thanos: The Infinity Relativity OGN! When last we saw Adam Warlock, he was a captive of Annihilus of the Negative Zone. So where does The Infinity Entity #1 find him? Hanging with the original Avengers? Then things start getting weird. But what else would you expect from the cosmic team of Jim Starlin and Alan Davis? Guest-starring the Guardians of the Galaxy!
metadata.name: The Infinity Entity
